Reviews.Title: “hotel is fine, location is not”

Reviews.Content: hotel amazing bad staff nice helpful restaurant expensive breakfast provided free morning variety actually center rome bit trek nearest train station tiburtina looking map wasnt walk women didnt feel safe moment stepped hotel onto street opted taking bus tiburtina bus station pretty busy hard cross street bus packed okay feel bit safer closer action dont recommend staying youre okay little transportation cheaper price okay
